column4: I have a question about wifi routers and don't know where to ask
I have my router set up and I have 2 young school age children who have access and I need to limit their access speeds as they are taking all my bandwidth
It's not related to wifi there is a firewall problem. I never did such things by the way
What I would like to do is limit them to about 50Kbps as it is I only have 270K here and they are syphoning all of it
